message.body: Gabi you're in charge of playbill right? Should I be threatening those who haven't sent their bio? I've tried but they aren't responsive...so am wondering at what point it will be too late and they won't be in playbill
No reason to rush them for playbills sake, but i would rush them for char. Development sake. I would also like to proof read them at a meeting for periodness and getting the right story aesthetic
Ok will do! Also I am booked up this weekend but could meet with your friend during rehearsal or via email!
